textgoal: Define a function that outputs the days left until weekend
defines: ['function howFarFromWeekend(x) { return isWeekend(x) ? 0 : 1 + howFarFromWeekend(tomorrow(x)); }', 'function addTwo(x) { return twice(addOne, x); }', 'function addFour(x) { return twice(addTwo, x); }']
